title: Fyre Festival Fruit Sales
description:
This week, Meredith and Patton talk about their theme song, Zoom Grammy Awards, rotten fruit, customer service woes, and more!

Have something interesting you want to share with us? Email us at HeyDidYouGetMyText@gmail.com, or record a message at www.speakpipe.com/didyougetmytext.
